Verses: 1 manusharaalumalla, Manushan Moolamaayumalla, Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Avarai Mariththorilirundhezhuppina Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Apposthalanaayirukkira Pavulaagiya Naanum,
2 ennudanekooda Irukkira Sagodhararellaarum, Kalaaththiyaa Naattilulla Sabaigalukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
3 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga;
4 avar Nammai Ippozhudhirukkira Pollaadha Pirapanjaththinindru Viduvikkumpadi Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Nammudaiya Paavangalukkaagath Thammaiththaame Oppukkoduththaar;
5 avarukku Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Magimai Undaavadhaaga Aamen.
6 ungalaik Kiristhuvin Kirubaiyinaale Azhaiththavarai Neengal Ivvalavu Seekkiramaai Vittu, Veroru Suviseshaththirkuth Thirumbugiradhaippatri Naan Aachchariyappadugiren;
7 veroru Suvisesham Illaiye; Silar Ungalaik Kalagappaduththi, Kiristhuvinudaiya Suviseshaththaip Puratta Manadhaayirukkiraargaleyallaamal Veralla.

8 naangal Ungalukkup Pirasangiththa Suviseshaththaiyallaamal, Naangalaavadhu, Vaanaththilirundhu Varugira Oru Thoodhanaavadhu, Veroru Suviseshaththai Ungalukkup Pirasangiththaal, Avan Sabikkappattavanaayirukkakkadavan.
9 mun Sonnadhupola Marupadiyum Sollugiren; Neengal Etrukkonda Suviseshaththaiyallaamal Veroru Suviseshaththai Oruvan Ungalukkup Pirasangiththaal Avan Sabikkappattavanaayirukkakkadavan.

10 ippozhudhu Naan Manusharaiyaa, Dhevanaiyaa, Yaarai Naadip Bodhikkiren? Manusharaiyaa Piriyappaduththap Paarkkiren? Naan Innum Manusharaip Piriyappaduththugiravanaayirundhaal Naan Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaaranallave.
11 melum, Sagodharare, Ennaal Pirasangikkappatta Suvisesham Manusharudaiya Yosanaiyinpadiyaanadhallavendru Ungalukkuth Therivikkiren.
12 naan Adhai Oru Manushanaal Petradhumillai, Manushanaal Katradhumillai, Yesukiristhuve Adhai Enakku Velippaduththinaar.
13 naan Yoodhamaarkkaththilirundhabodhu Ennudaiya Nadakkaiyaikkuriththuk Kelvippattiruppeergal; Dhevanudaiya Sabaiyai Naan Migavum Thunbappaduththi, Adhaip Paazhaakki;
14 en Janaththaaril En Vayadhulla Anegaraippaarkkilum Yoodhamaarkkaththile Therinavanaai, En Pidhaakkaludaiya Paarambariya Niyaayangalukkaaga Migavum Bakthivairaakkiyamullavanaayirundhen.
15 appadiyirundhum, Naan En Thaayin Vayitrilirundhadhu Mudhal, Ennaip Piriththeduththu, Thammudaiya Kirubaiyinaal Azhaiththa Dhevan,

16 thammudaiya Kumaaranai Naan Purajaadhigalidaththil Suviseshamaai Arivikkumporuttaaga, Avarai Enakkul Velippaduththap Piriyamaayirundhabodhu, Udane Naan Maamsaththodum Raththaththodum Yosanaipannaamalum;
17 enakku Munne Apposthalaraanavargalidaththile Erusalemukkuppogaamalum; Arabidhesaththirkup Purappattuppoi, Marupadiyum Thamasku Oorukkuth Thirumbivandhen.
18 moondru Varusham Sendra Pinbu, Pedhuruvaik Kandukollumpadi Naan Erusalemukkup Poi, Avanidaththil Padhinaindhu Naal Thangiyirundhen.
19 karththarudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Yaakkobaith Thavira, Apposthalaril Veroruvaraiyum Naan Kaanavillai.
20 naan Ungalukku Ezhudhugira Ivaigal Poiyallavendru Dhevanukkumunbaaga Nichchayamaai Sollugiren.
21 pinbu, Seeriyaa Silisiyaa Naadugalin Purangalil Vandhen.
22 melum Yoodheyaadhesaththile Kiristhuvukkullaana Sabaigalukku Mugamariyaadhavanaayirundhen.
23 munne Nammaith Thunbappaduththinavane, Thaan Azhikkaththedina Visuvaasaththai Ippozhudhu Pirasangikkiraanenbadhai Maaththiram Avargal Kelvippattirundhu,
24 ennaippatri Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.
